trans-unit.source: Contains a list of possible states for the audio input to a speech recognition engine.
trans-unit.target: 음성 인식 엔진에 대 한 오디오 입력에 대 한 가능한 상태의 목록을 포함합니다.

trans-unit.source: You can obtain the audio input state of the speech recognition engine with the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.AudioState%2A?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioState%2A?displayProperty=fullName> properties.
trans-unit.target: 사용 하 여 음성 인식 엔진의 오디오 입력된 상태를 가져올 수 있습니다는 <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.AudioState%2A?displayProperty=fullName>및 <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioState%2A?displayProperty=fullName>속성.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioState%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.AudioState%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.AudioStateChanged?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioStateChanged?displayProperty=fullName> events are raised when the audio input state of a speech recognition engine changes.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.AudioStateChanged?displayProperty=fullName>및 <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioStateChanged?displayProperty=fullName>오디오 입력 음성 인식 엔진 변경의 상태 이벤트가 발생 합니다.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioStateChanged?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.AudioStateChanged?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Receiving silence or non-speech background noise.
trans-unit.target: 수신 대기 또는 비 음성 배경 노이즈입니다.
